references.paper_title: High-dimensional Ising model selection using l₁-regularized logistic regression
references.reason: This paper is foundational for understanding the theoretical properties of precision matrix estimation in high-dimensional settings and provides essential theoretical guarantees that are relevant to the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Model selection and estimation in the Gaussian graphical model
references.reason: This paper introduced the fundamental concepts and methods for estimating Gaussian graphical models, which forms the basis for many subsequent works in precision matrix estimation.

references.paper_title: Covariate-adjusted precision matrix estimation with an application in genetical genomics
references.reason: This paper offers a statistically sound approach for precision matrix estimation that explicitly accounts for covariates, enhancing the accuracy and applicability of the method in various domains like genetics.

references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of Model-Agnostic Meta-Learning (MAML), which is highly relevant to the proposed method as it facilitates efficient adaptation to new tasks by leveraging prior knowledge.

references.paper_title: Quic: quadratic approximation for sparse inverse covariance estimation
references.reason: This paper proposed the QUIC algorithm, a highly efficient method for sparse inverse covariance estimation which is used as a baseline in the paper and is directly compared to the proposed method.
